resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106259</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205258</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Civil Disobedience Action Plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ZivilMissachtung-Aktionsplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan d'action de Désobéissance Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta De Ação Da Rebeldia civil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piano d'azione Di Disobedience Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστικό πρόγραμμα δράσης ανυπακοής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan De Acción De la Desobediencia Civil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson acquaints students with historical and current concepts of civil disobedience. They will also consider issues that affect their own lives in relation to civil disobedience. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion teilt Kursteilnehmer mit den 
historischen und aktuellen Konzepten der ZivilMissachtung mit. 
Sie betrachten auch Ausgaben, die ihre eigenen Lebensdauern in 
bezug auf eine ZivilMissachtung beeinflussen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon met au courant des étudiants des 
concepts historiques et actuels de désobéissance civile. Ils 
considéreront également les issues qui affectent leurs propres vies 
par rapport à la désobéissance civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição familiariza estudantes com os 
conceitos históricos e atuais da rebeldia civil. Considerarão 
também as edições que afetam suas próprias vidas com relação à 
rebeldia civil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione informa gli allievi dei concetti 
storici e correnti di disobedience civile. Egualmente 
considereranno le edizioni che interessano le loro proprie vite 
rispetto a disobedience civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξοικειώνει τους σπουδαστές με τις 
ιστορικές και παρούσες έννοιες της αστικής ανυπακοής. Θα 
εξετάσουν επίσης τα ζητήματα που έχουν επιπτώσεις στις ζωές τους
σε σχέση με την αστική ανυπακοή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección conoce a estudiantes de conceptos 
históricos y actuales de la desobediencia civil. También 
considerarán las ediciones que afectan sus propias vidas en lo 
referente a desobediencia civil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
